reference.t1: Description of last instar and pupa of Pyropyga nigricans (Coleoptera : Lampyridae, Photinini) and comparison with larvae of other Photinini genera
Description of the preimaginal stages of Pyractomena borealis (Randall, 1838) (Coleoptera : Lampyridae) and notes on its biology
reference.jf: Proceedings of the Entomological Society of Washington
reference.ab: The preimaginal stages of Pyractomena borealis (Randall 1838) are described and illustrated. Information on the biology is also included. A detailed description of the functional morphology of the holdfast organ of the larva is presented together with a schematic illustration, step by step, of the eversion process. Instructions on rearing techniques are also provided.
reference.no: PT: J; NR: 20; TC: 4; J9: PROC ENTOMOL SOC WASH; PG: 10; GA: 104WN
